creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: pleated, 3 panelled skirt with sections at top and middle of dyed fabric, surrounded by appliqued red fabric; near bottom - band embroidered with dark maroon, gold and aqua with red stripes appliqued intermittently; black pleated fabric at bottom; skirt is gathered at waist and has one side seam pocket
title: Skirt
